肾移植可及性方面的民族和种族差异该研究强调了个性化治疗的迫切需要，以解决每个民族和种族群体在肾移植护理过程中遇到的独特挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ethnic-and-racial-disparities-in-accessibility-to-kidney-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ethnic-and-racial-disparities-in-accessibility-to-kidney-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c3226ab-300b-42ef-89a6-c285ff6d5766 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Ethnic and racial disparities in accessibility to kidney transplants
欧盟新项目旨在预防和减少孤独感孤独影响着许多人，它既伤害个人，也伤害社区。 “欧洲的社会孤立和孤独感网络：关于其原因、后果和监测的基于证据的政策建议”（LONELY-EU）项目旨在解决这一问题：由波鸿鲁尔大学心理学家 Maike Luhmann 教授协调德国的一个国际联盟正在设计共享知识和汇集专业知识的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-EU-project-aims-to-prevent-and-reduce-loneiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-EU-project-aims-to-prevent-and-reduce-loneiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f40e8eb9-8afb-4ff9-9930-28e43045be49 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 07:27:19 -0400
罂粟籽酿造引发吗啡过量，引起立法者的关注这听起来像个笑话：罂粟籽中注入了阿片类药物。事实上，这是情景喜剧《宋飞正传》中的一个情节。但对某些人来说，这是一场悲剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Poppy-seed-brew-triggers-morphine-overdose-drawing-attention-of-lawmakers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Poppy-seed-brew-triggers-morphine-overdose-drawing-attention-of-lawmakers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8411806-aa8d-495f-bfd9-d8517528ff7c Wed, 09 Oct 2024 06:40:00 -0400 Poppy seed brew triggers morphine overdose, drawing attention of lawmakers

肝癌患者通过精准医疗工具清楚地了解手术选择杜克大学-新加坡国立大学校友 Marjorie Hoang 博士（2023 届）和她的导师 Pierce Chow 教授通过创建一种可以准确计算的算法，让诊断为中期肝癌的患者及其医生所面临的复杂决策过程变得清晰。手术后可能的总生存期和无复发生存期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Liver-cancer-病人-gain-clarity-on-surgery-options-through- precision-medicine-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Liver-cancer-病人-gain-clarity-on-surgery-options-through- precision-medicine-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7390564-e7aa-4114-b153-1cfbb2618137 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:36:04 -0400 Liver cancer patients gain clarity on surgery options through precision medicine tool
新研究将大脑活动与日常行为和长期心理健康联系起来在一项罕见的纵向研究中，阿尔托大学和奥卢大学的研究人员利用脑部扫描以及可穿戴设备和智能手机的数据跟踪一个人的大脑和行为活动长达五个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-study-links-brain-activity-with-daily-behavior-and-long-term-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-study-links-brain-activity-with-daily-behavior-and-long-term-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=831ea9b6-67b1-474e-aff0-42ad5626683b Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:24:06 -0400 New study links brain activity with daily behavior and long-term mental health
COVID-19 显着增加中风风险研究人员对 34 项系统评价和 70 项研究进行了元伞审查，发现了 COVID-19 严重程度与中风风险增加之间的显着联系。该审查强调需要进一步调查潜在机制和潜在偏见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-significantly-raises-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-significantly-raises-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e90e5db-640f-4f02-811b-458cee8f63d7 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:20:00 -0400 COVID-19 significantly raises stroke risk
